content.title: Concept Discovery
content.description: Every great project starts with a clear idea. We listen closely and ask the right questions. Together, we lay the groundwork for turning your vision into something tangible.

content.title: Brainstorming Workshop
content.description: In this phase, collaboration drives innovation. We explore various approaches, refine each concept, and map out a solid plan to transform your idea into an executable strategy.

content.title: Visual Design
content.description: Here, we translate concepts into engaging visuals and intuitive interfaces. Our goal is to create designs that not only look exceptional but also deliver a seamless experience for your users.

content.title: Solution Development
content.description: This is where designs come to life. Leveraging modern technologies and best practices, we build robust, scalable solutions tailored precisely to your requirements.

content.title: Quality Assurance
content.description: Quality is our top priority. Through thorough testing—functional, performance, and usability—we ensure your solution is reliable, bug-free, and ready to impress end users.

content.title: Strategic Launch
content.description: Launching is more than just going live—it’s setting the stage for future growth. We coordinate deployments carefully, monitor initial performance, and make sure everything runs smoothly from day one.

content.title: Ongoing Support
content.description: Our partnership doesn’t end at launch. We provide ongoing support, updates, and maintenance, ensuring your solution continues to perform optimally and adapt to evolving needs.

Introduction

Welcome to Evidente d.o.o. This Privacy Policy and Cookie Notice provide detailed information on how we collect, use, manage, and protect your personal data. We are committed to ensuring the privacy and security of your information.

Privacy Policy

Data Collection

Evidente d.o.o. prioritizes efficiency and user experience, so we only collect the minimal data necessary for these purposes. Specifically, we collect locale settings to tailor language preferences, may use interaction data from reCAPTCHA to prevent abuse and spam, and may use data collected by third-party analytics tools, such as Google Analytics, to improve our services. Our goal is not to collect your data but to ensure a pleasant experience on our website without unnecessary data collection.

Use of Information

The collected information is used solely to enhance user experience, ensure website security, and analyze site usage to make the website as effective as possible for you. We do not sell or rent personally identifiable user information to third parties.

Cookie Policy

Cookies (not the edible kind) are small files that a website or its service provider transfers to your computer's hard drive through your web browser (if you allow). They enable the website or service provider's systems to recognize your browser and record and remember certain information.

Types of Cookies We Use

Essential Cookies

Necessary for the operation of our website. These include, for example, local cookies that allow us to select the appropriate language for you.

Analytical Cookies

Allow us to recognize and count the number of visitors and see how visitors move around the website when using it. This helps us improve how our website works.

Functional Cookies

Used to recognize you when you return to our website. This allows us to remember your preferences and make your visit more comfortable.

Managing Cookies

You have the option to accept or decline cookies. Most web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can usually change your browser settings to decline cookies if you prefer. Please note that this may significantly reduce your experience on our website.

Your Rights

You have the right to request access to the personal data we hold about you, correct any inaccuracies, request deletion or restriction of your personal data, object to processing, and request data portability.

Changes to This Policy

From time to time, we may update our Privacy Policy and Cookie Notice. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any updates.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about privacy or cookies, please contact us using the email address provided in the footer of this website.
